title: England vs New Zealand - Rugby World Cup 2019: Live score and updates from Japan
text:
England's dream of making the Rugby World Cup final for first time since 2007 will see them take on favourites and defending champions New Zealand.

Eddie Jones' men will be looking to replicate a similar performance to their clash with Australia last week as they look to beat the All Blacks for first time since 2012, coming close last year when they loss by 1-point in the Autumn Internationals.

Beauden Barrett and Co will looking continue their form throughout the tournament in Japan as they look to prevent England getting a foot in the game.

Sportsmail's JAMES AYLES will provide Rugby World Cup coverage England vs New Zealand including score, sin bins, substitutions, injuries and more.
description: England's dream of making the Rugby World Cup final for first time since 2007 will see them take on favourites and defending champions New Zealand. Follow LIVE ACTION RIGHT HERE.
